thread.title: The Bollywood Actress Most Of You Missed Spotting At The Oscars
thread.title_full: The Bollywood Actress Most Of You Missed Spotting At The Oscars

title: The Bollywood Actress Most Of You Missed Spotting At The Oscars
text:
facebook 451 SHARES 
Yes, Priyanka Chopra represented the Bolywood fam at the Oscars red carpet today in a gown that is currently up for debate (technically, though, she was there as Hollywood royalty). Amid reviewing PeeCee’s Oscar outing, most of you missed another fireball of Indian talent, Priyanka Bose. The actress who starred alongside Dev Patel in the much-talked-about movie, Lion, was seen working her red-carpet walk like an award-season pro. 
redcarpetgreendress/via Instagram 
Wearing an off-shoulder printed Vivienne Westwood gown, that featured an Oscars-verified thigh-high slit, the actress took to the red carpet with the intent to slay. And slay, she did! Shoulder-grazing beach hair, spring-pink lips, and jewels by Swarovski accompanied the actress’ list-topping outing. A post shared by Priyanka (@priyankabose20) on Feb 26, 2017 at 1:44pm PST 
Oh, and ICYMI, her gown was tailored in collaboration with Red Carpet Green Dress, which has a history of creating cool sustainable dresses. So much win!
